name: Brice A. J. Sarver, Ph.D.
body: This is Brice Sarver's personal webpage. I am in the process of migrating everything to GitHub. In the meantime, please check out my [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=raRJOYQAAAAJ&hl=en) page, my [GitHub](http://github.com/bricesarver) (soon to host much of my codebase), or contact me directly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
